description:
Keep a cool head on your daily commute. With 13 vents, the Express helmet makes sure you feel the wind in your hair, while the in-mold construction and MIPS® technology keeps you safe.

  • MIPS® technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched between the foam and the padding reduces the rotational torque on the skull
  • Deep design provides increased protection on the back of the head
  • 13 strategically placed vents
  • Quick drying liner wicks away moisture
  • Dial fit system offers easy adjustments
  • Integrated rear light (solid and flashing modes) and reflective straps help keep you seen
  • Removeable fabric visor
name: Smith Express MIPS Helmet - Unisex
